20101217020411.000|20101217020413.000|CCO|>> TODAY, AL-QAIDA'S SENIOR
20101217020413.000|20101217020415.000|CCO|LEADERSHIP IN THE BORDER REGION

20101217020424.333|20101217020426.000|CCO|IT'S HARDER FOR THEM TO RECRUIT;

20101217020433.500|20101217020434.750|CCO|DOWN.
20101217020434.750|20101217020436.000|CCO|>> Reporter: BUT THE PRESIDENT
20101217020436.000|20101217020437.250|CCO|WAS MORE CAUTIOUS ABOUT THE
20101217020437.250|20101217020438.500|CCO|SITUATION ON THE GROUND IN
20101217020438.500|20101217020439.750|CCO|AFGHANISTAN.
20101217020439.750|20101217020441.000|CCO|>> PROGRESS COMES SLOWLY AND AT
20101217020441.000|20101217020443.000|CCO|A VERY HIGH PRICE IN THE LIVES
20101217020443.000|20101217020445.000|CCO|OF OUR MEN AND WOMEN IN UNIFORM.

20101217020447.000|20101217020449.000|CCO|MADE ARE STILL FRAGILE AND
20101217020449.000|20101217020451.000|CCO|REVERSIBLE.
20101217020451.000|20101217020452.667|CCO|>> Reporter: MOST OF THE
20101217020452.667|20101217020454.333|CCO|INTERNATIONAL TROOPS IN
20101217020454.333|20101217020456.000|CCO|AFGHANISTAN ARE AMERICAN--
20101217020456.000|20101217020457.667|CCO|100,000 OF THEM.
20101217020457.667|20101217020459.333|CCO|ANOTHER 41,000 FOREIGN TROOPS
20101217020459.333|20101217020501.000|CCO|ARE ALSO SERVING, UNDER NATO
20101217020501.000|20101217020503.000|CCO|COMMAND.
20101217020503.000|20101217020505.000|CCO|DEFENSE SECRETARY ROBERT GATES
20101217020505.000|20101217020507.000|CCO|SAID TODAY A U.S. DRAWDOWN CAN
20101217020507.000|20101217020509.000|CCO|STILL BEGIN  NEXT JULY, WITH A
20101217020509.000|20101217020511.000|CCO|GOAL OF HANDING OVER CONTROL TO
20101217020511.000|20101217020513.000|CCO|THE AFGHANS BY THE END OF 2014.
20101217020513.000|20101217020515.000|CCO|>> IN TERMS OF WHEN THE TROOPS
20101217020515.000|20101217020517.000|CCO|COME OUT, THE PRESIDENT HAS MADE
20101217020517.000|20101217020519.000|CCO|CLEAR IT'LL BE CONDITIONS-BASED.
20101217020519.000|20101217020521.000|CCO|IN TERMS OF WHAT THAT LINE LOOKS
20101217020521.000|20101217020523.000|CCO|LIKE BEYOND JULY 2011, I THINK
20101217020523.000|20101217020525.000|CCO|THE ANSWER IS, WE DON'T KNOW AT
20101217020525.000|20101217020527.000|CCO|THIS POINT.
20101217020527.000|20101217020529.000|CCO|BUT THE HOPE IS THAT AS WE
20101217020529.000|20101217020531.000|CCO|PROGRESS, THAT THOSE DRAWDOWNS
20101217020531.000|20101217020533.500|CCO|WILL BE ABLE TO ACCELERATE.
20101217020533.500|20101217020536.000|CCO|>> Reporter: IN THE MEANTIME,
20101217020536.000|20101217020538.500|CCO|CASUALTIES ARE MOUNTING.
20101217020538.500|20101217020541.000|CCO|SINCE THE WAR BEGAN NINE YEARS
20101217020541.000|20101217020543.000|CCO|AGO, MORE THAN 2,200 COALITION
20101217020543.000|20101217020545.000|CCO|TROOPS HAVE LOST THEIR LIVES.
20101217020545.000|20101217020547.000|CCO|OF THOSE, 1,436 WERE AMERICAN,
20101217020547.000|20101217020549.000|CCO|INCLUDING 489 THIS YEAR ALONE,
20101217020549.000|20101217020551.000|CCO|THE HIGHEST ONE-YEAR TOLL OF THE
20101217020551.000|20101217020552.667|CCO|ENTIRE WAR.
20101217020552.667|20101217020554.333|CCO|THE FIVE-PAGE UNCLASSIFIED
20101217020554.333|20101217020556.000|CCO|SUMMARY ACKNOWLEDGED TWO
20101217020556.000|20101217020557.667|CCO|SIGNIFICANT CHALLENGES TO
20101217020557.667|20101217020559.333|CCO|WINDING DOWN THE WAR AND
20101217020559.333|20101217020601.000|CCO|BRINGING HOME THE TROOPS.
20101217020601.000|20101217020603.000|CCO|ONE IS THE POOR QUALITY OF
20101217020603.000|20101217020605.000|CCO|GOVERNANCE IN AFGHANISTAN UNDER
20101217020605.000|20101217020607.000|CCO|ITS PRESIDENT, HAMID KARZAI.
20101217020607.000|20101217020609.000|CCO|THE OTHER, IS THE CONTINUING
20101217020609.000|20101217020611.000|CCO|EXISTENCE OF MILITANT
20101217020611.000|20101217020612.429|CCO|SANCTUARIES IN PAKISTAN.
20101217020612.429|20101217020613.857|CCO|SECRETARY GATES SAID TODAY
20101217020613.857|20101217020615.286|CCO|THERE'S BEEN SOME PROGRESS IN
20101217020615.286|20101217020616.714|CCO|GETTING PAKISTAN TO GO AFTER
20101217020616.714|20101217020618.143|CCO|INSURGENT REDOUBTS WITHIN ITS
20101217020618.143|20101217020619.571|CCO|BORDERS.
20101217020619.571|20101217020621.000|CCO|>> I THINK THAT LIKE IN MANY OF
20101217020621.000|20101217020623.500|CCO|THE THINGS THAT WE'VE DEALT WITH
20101217020623.500|20101217020626.000|CCO|PAKISTAN, THINGS WILL MOVE IN
20101217020626.000|20101217020628.500|CCO|THE RIGHT DIRECTION.
20101217020628.500|20101217020631.000|CCO|IT WILL PROBABLY TAKE LONGER
20101217020631.000|20101217020632.429|CCO|THAN WE WOULD LIKE, BUT THEY
20101217020632.429|20101217020633.857|CCO|HAVE MADE CLEAR THEIR
20101217020633.857|20101217020635.286|CCO|INTENTIONS.
20101217020635.286|20101217020636.714|CCO|>> Reporter: GATES WAS PRESSED
20101217020636.714|20101217020638.143|CCO|ON HOW DURABLE ANY OF THE GAINS
20101217020638.143|20101217020639.571|CCO|ARE IN AFGHANISTAN.
20101217020639.571|20101217020641.000|CCO|>> THERE ARE REPORTS-- FROM ON
20101217020641.000|20101217020642.667|CCO|THE GROUND, FROM VARIOUS
20101217020642.667|20101217020644.333|CCO|SOURCES, AND APPARENTLY REPORTS
20101217020644.333|20101217020646.000|CCO|OF... INTELLIGENCE AGENCY
20101217020646.000|20101217020647.667|CCO|REPORTS RECENTLY WHICH PAINT A
20101217020647.667|20101217020649.333|CCO|DARKER PICTURE, A PICTURE OF
20101217020649.333|20101217020651.000|CCO|CORRUPTION, INCOMPETENCE,
20101217020651.000|20101217020653.500|CCO|WEAKNESS OR ABSENCE OF
20101217020653.500|20101217020656.000|CCO|GOVERNMENT IN AFGHANISTAN.
20101217020656.000|20101217020658.500|CCO|SO WHAT REASON IS THERE TO
20101217020658.500|20101217020701.000|CCO|BELIEVE THAT IN THE LONG RUN YOU
20101217020701.000|20101217020703.000|CCO|CAN PREVAIL IN AFGHANISTAN?"
20101217020703.000|20101217020705.000|CCO|>> THE KEY HERE IS TO IDENTIFY
20101217020705.000|20101217020707.000|CCO|OUR OBJECTIVES CLEARLY.
20101217020707.000|20101217020709.000|CCO|AS THE PRESIDENT SAID, OUR GOAL
20101217020709.000|20101217020711.000|CCO|ISN'T TO BUILD A 21ST CENTURY
20101217020711.000|20101217020713.000|CCO|AFGHANISTAN.
20101217020713.000|20101217020715.000|CCO|OUR GOAL IS NOT A COUNTRY THAT
20101217020715.000|20101217020717.000|CCO|IS FREE OF CORRUPTION, WHICH
20101217020717.000|20101217020719.000|CCO|WOULD BE UNIQUE IN THE ENTIRE
20101217020719.000|20101217020721.000|CCO|REGION.
20101217020721.000|20101217020723.500|CCO|OUR GOAL IS:  WHAT DO WE NEED TO
20101217020723.500|20101217020726.000|CCO|DO, ALONG WITH OUR PARTNERS AND
20101217020726.000|20101217020728.500|CCO|THE AFGHANS, TO TURN BACK THE
20101217020728.500|20101217020731.000|CCO|TALIBAN'S MILITARY AND VIOLENT
20101217020731.000|20101217020734.333|CCO|CAPABILITIES TO THE DEGREE THAT
20101217020734.333|20101217020737.667|CCO|THE AFGHAN GOVERNMENT FORCES CAN
20101217020737.667|20101217020741.000|CCO|DEAL WITH THEM, AND TO PROVIDE
20101217020741.000|20101217020744.333|CCO|SOME MINIMAL CAPABILITY AT THE
20101217020744.333|20101217020747.667|CCO|LOCAL, DISTRICT AND PROVINCIAL
20101217020747.667|20101217020751.000|CCO|LEVEL FOR SECURITY, FOR DISPUTE
20101217020751.000|20101217020753.000|CCO|RESOLUTION FOR PERHAPS A CLINIC
20101217020753.000|20101217020755.000|CCO|WITHIN AN HOUR'S WALK?
20101217020755.000|20101217020757.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THE COST OF THE WAR
20101217020757.000|20101217020759.000|CCO|TO ACHIEVE THOSE GOALS KEEPS
20101217020759.000|20101217020801.000|CCO|CLIMBING, AND U.S. PUBLIC
20101217020801.000|20101217020802.667|CCO|SUPPORT KEEPS SLIPPING WITH 60%
20101217020802.667|20101217020804.333|CCO|DISAPPROVING, IN A RECENT
20101217020804.333|20101217020806.000|CCO|"WASHINGTON POST/ABC" POLL.
20101217020806.000|20101217020807.667|CCO|ASKED ABOUT THAT, SECRETARY OF
20101217020807.667|20101217020809.333|CCO|STATE CLINTON INSISTED TODAY
20101217020809.333|20101217020811.000|CCO|THAT WAR POLICY WILL NOT BE
20101217020811.000|20101217020814.333|CCO|GOVERNED BY POLLS.
20101217020814.333|20101217020817.667|CCO|>> I'M VERY RESPECTFUL OF THE
20101217020817.667|20101217020821.000|CCO|FEELINGS OF THE AMERICAN PEOPLE.
20101217020821.000|20101217020823.000|CCO|BUT THE QUESTION I WOULD ASK IS:
20101217020823.000|20101217020825.000|CCO|HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT A
20101217020825.000|20101217020827.000|CCO|CONTINUING AMERICAN COMMITMENT
20101217020827.000|20101217020829.000|CCO|THAT IS AIMED AT PROTECTING YOU
20101217020829.000|20101217020831.000|CCO|AND YOUR FAMILY NOW AND INTO THE
20101217020831.000|20101217020832.667|CCO|FUTURE?
20101217020832.667|20101217020834.333|CCO|BECAUSE THAT'S THE QUESTION THAT
20101217020834.333|20101217020836.000|CCO|WE'VE ASKED, AND THIS IS HOW
20101217020836.000|20101217020837.667|CCO|WE'VE ANSWERED IT.
20101217020837.667|20101217020839.333|CCO|>> Reporter: ULTIMATELY CLINTON
20101217020839.333|20101217020841.000|CCO|SAID, THE U.S. MUST MAKE SURE
20101217020841.000|20101217020842.429|CCO|THE PAKISTAN-AFGHANISTAN REGION
20101217020842.429|20101217020843.857|CCO|IS NOT ABANDONED TO AMERICA'S

20101217024348.143|20101217024349.571|CCO|>> IN 1936, THE CLEVELAND SCOUT
20101217024349.571|20101217024351.000|CCO|SIGNED AN IOWA FARM BOY NAMED
20101217024351.000|20101217024352.667|CCO|BOB FELLER.
20101217024352.667|20101217024354.333|CCO|HE'S YOUNG, AND GREEN AND MAYBE
20101217024354.333|20101217024356.000|CCO|A LITTLE SCARED.
20101217024356.000|20101217024357.667|CCO|BUT HE CAN THROW THE BALL WITH
20101217024357.667|20101217024359.333|CCO|AMAZING SPEED.
20101217024359.333|20101217024401.000|CCO|>> Suarez: AMAZING MIGHT HAVE
20101217024401.000|20101217024402.667|CCO|BEEN AN UNDERSTATEMENT.
20101217024402.667|20101217024404.333|CCO|BOB FELLER LEARNED TO THROW THAT
20101217024404.333|20101217024406.000|CCO|FASTBALL AT HIS FAMILY'S FARM IN
20101217024406.000|20101217024407.667|CCO|VAN METER, IOWA.
20101217024407.667|20101217024409.333|CCO|IT EARNED HIM THE NICKNAMES
20101217024409.333|20101217024411.000|CCO|"RAPID ROBERT," "BULLET BOB" AND
20101217024411.000|20101217024413.500|CCO|"THE HEATER FROM VAN METER."
20101217024413.500|20101217024416.000|CCO|IT WAS A BLISTERING PITCH, IF
20101217024416.000|20101217024418.500|CCO|YOU COULD SEE IT.
20101217024418.500|20101217024421.000|CCO|ONCE, AFTER HE WAS BLOWN AWAY BY
20101217024421.000|20101217024423.500|CCO|A FELLER THIRD-STRIKE, YANKEES'
20101217024423.500|20101217024426.000|CCO|GREAT LEFTY GOMEZ SAID, "THAT
20101217024426.000|20101217024428.500|CCO|LAST ONE SOUNDED A LITTLE LOW."
20101217024428.500|20101217024431.000|CCO|BOB FELLER MADE HIS MAJOR LEAGUE
20101217024431.000|20101217024433.000|CCO|DEBUT AT AGE 17 FOR THE
20101217024433.000|20101217024435.000|CCO|CLEVELAND INDIANS ON HIS SUMMER
20101217024435.000|20101217024437.000|CCO|VACATION FROM SCHOOL.
20101217024437.000|20101217024439.000|CCO|IN HIS FIRST START HE STRUCK OUT
20101217024439.000|20101217024441.000|CCO|15, AND WEEKS LATER, MADE IT 17,
20101217024441.000|20101217024442.429|CCO|TYING WHAT WAS THEN THE RECORD
20101217024442.429|20101217024443.857|CCO|FOR MOST STRIKEOUTS IN A SINGLE
20101217024443.857|20101217024445.286|CCO|GAME.

20101217024446.714|20101217024448.143|CCO|HUMBLING THE BOLDEST BATS IN THE
